doc.title: G4's Training Camp
doc.plot: Training Camp takes video gamers off the couch and puts them on the field, in the rink, on the court, in the ring and on the track with today's biggest athletes. Hosted by NFL star Eddie George, each 30-minute episode offers a different gamer the ultimate in sports fantasy fulfillment. In exchange for their personal secrets, tips and tricks to dominating top sports titles, Training Camp transports the gamer into the real world of their favorite sports video game, where they get a taste of what it's like to play with the pros.
